author: terencechain

author: robocopsgonemad
content: are the hive config files used on hivecancun.ethdevops.io posted anywhere? I'm getting differing test results when I run a local cluster with just 1 besu, so I'd like to compare configs

author: marioevz
content: Hey yes, these should be it: https://github.com/ethereum/hive/blob/master/configs/cancun.yaml

author: marioevz
content: We are running with `--sim.parallelism 2` in the server for the Engine API tests, so that is one thing to consider
